meta.title: Image Attention
meta.description: Look at a series of images and record what code you see.
meta.disclaimer: Your participation in this research is voluntary. You may decline further participation, at any time, without adverse consequences. Your anonymity is assured; the researchers who have requested your participation will not receive any personal information about you.

instructions.simple: Record the three-character code you see after an image is shown.
steps: You will be shown an image for a couple of seconds.
You will then briefly be shown a chart of three-character codes.
You will be asked to record what three-letter code you saw when the image disappeared.
Some images will contain just a single black-and-white image of a face. For these images, follow the face with your eyes and input the code that appears in the same spot as the face.
This process will repeat several times.
